title: LA Clashes Escalate as Trump, Newsom Spar
description: "Balance of Power: Late Edition" focuses on the intersection of politics and global business. On today's show, David Leopold, Former President of the American Immigration Lawyers Association, discusses the legal implications of the Los Angeles protests escalation. Rep. Darrell Issa (R) California discusses why he believes the Trump Administration having the National Guard and Marines deployed in Los Angeles to put a stop to the protests is not an encroachment on state's rights. Melanie Hart, Senior Director at the Atlantic Council's Global China Hub, weighs in on what to expect from a second day of trading talks between the United States and China. (Source: Bloomberg)
